name: UE - Pinball
description:
This was my first project using the Unreal Engine.

The game was done 100% based on blueprints and with the use of a tutorial from Udemy.

The game as basic functionalities like:

  1. Flippers work with A for Left and D for Right
  2. Bumpers and Letters give points
  3. Letters give multipliers
  4. Tilt function for Left and Right with a limit of 3
  5. Highscore save list
